content: This room is opened in the <1>{{roomMode}}</1> mode. If you have an account in this {{productName}}, please authorize.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a toast message prompting users to authorize access to their account when they enter a public room in the application. The message includes placeholders for room mode and product name, which will be replaced by actual values during translation. It appears as a modal or dialog prompt.
